brly/rkloader.description: BINARLY efiXplorer team has discovered an Advanced Persistent Threat called rkloader inside your firmware.

brly/2021-025.slug: SMM Callout Vulnerability in Combined DXE/SMM Driver
brly/2021-025.description: <0><1>BINARLY efiXplorer team</1></0> has discovered SMM callout vulnerability on a BullSequana Edge server allowing a possible attacker to hijack execution flow of a code running in System Management Mode. Exploiting this issue could lead to escalating privileges to SMM.
